name: Duck Trek III: The Search for Mom
name_original: Duck Trek III: The Search for Mom
description:
Browser compatible version of the game can be played here!

A GMTK Game Jam submission. An epic adventure of a duck, his dice and a quest to find mom.

We made this game as our first try at game development, after one of us did a single Godot tutorial, and the other never even having installed the engine beforehand.
Main character duck art was modified and customized by my sisters JD and JI.
Icon and cover art by my sister JI.

Credit and attributions

  • Most game art was gotten from https://kenney.nl
  • Original duck art: https://opengameart.org/content/character-spritesheet-duck
  • Dog art: https://opengameart.org/content/dog-3
